original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod de /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod de /

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /

translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'dus ma byas sam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas sam /
translated: bodhisattva great beings possess the eye of wisdom such that they know no phenomena whatsoever, whether conditioned or unconditioned,

original: dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am /🔽kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am /
translated: virtuous or nonvirtuous,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'am /🔽kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
translated: blameworthy or blameless,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am /🔽'jig rten pa'am /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am / 'jig rten pa'am /
translated: afflicted or unafflicted,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'am /
translated: mundane or supramundane,

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'am /🔽zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'am / zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas /
translated: or with or without outflows.

original: chos gang yang ma mthong ba med /
analyzed: chos gang yang ma mthong ba med /
translated: With the eye of wisdom, there is no phenomenon that they do not see,

original: ma thos pa med /
analyzed: ma thos pa med /
translated: no phenomenon that they do not hear,

original: ma bsam pa med; khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni /
analyzed: ma bsam pa med; khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni /
translated: no phenomenon that they do not think about, and no phenomenon that they do not comprehend.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: This is the purity of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s eye of wisdom.🔽Śāriputra said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: byang @248a *// chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
analyzed: byang @248a *// chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
translated: what is the purity of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva’s eye of Dharma?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni /
translated: here the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, with the eye of Dharma, sees that this person

original: dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba /
analyzed: dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba /
translated: is a follower of faith,

original: gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni /
translated: this person

original: chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba /
translated: is a follower of the Dharma,

original: gang zag 'di ni; stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni; stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste /
translated: and this person is abiding in emptiness.

original: gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni /
analyzed: gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni /
translated: The five faculties of this person

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will arise through the emptiness gate of liberation.

original: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the five faculties, he will attain the samādhi of the immediately preceding [mind].

original: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the samādhi of the immediately preceding [mind], the wisdom vision of liberation will arise.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang; tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te /🔽gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang; tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te / gang zag 'di ni /
translated: Through the vision of the wisdom of liberation, the three fetters of the view of the transitory collection, doubt, and holding a discipline and ritual to be paramount are completely abandoned.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This person is called a stream-enterer.

original: des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srab par byed de /🔽gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srab par byed de / gang zag 'di ni /
translated: Having attained the path of cultivation, he weakens the attachment of the desire realm and the malice.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
translated: This person is called a once-returner.

original: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de /🔽gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de / gang zag 'di ni /
translated: Having cultivated that path even more, he attains the abandonment of the attachment of the desire realm and the malice.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: This person is called a non-returner.

original: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas gzugs @248b kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste /
analyzed: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas gzugs @248b kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste /
translated: Having cultivated that path even more, he abandons the attachment of the form realm, the attachment of the formless realm, ignorance, pride, and excitation.

original: gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: gang zag 'di ni /
translated: This person is a bodhisattva.🔽

original: dgra bcom pa'o //🔽gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'o // gang zag 'di ni /
translated: This person is an arhat.

original: mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste /
translated: This person is one who abides in the signless.

original: gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni /
analyzed: gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni /
translated: The five faculties of this person

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will arise through the gate of liberation that is signless.

original: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the five faculties, he will attain the concentration of the immediate [attainment of nirvāṇa].

original: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Through the concentration of the immediate [attainment of nirvāṇa], the wisdom of liberation will arise.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te /🔽gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te / gang zag 'di ni /
translated: Through the wisdom of liberation, he will completely abandon the three fetters of the view of the transitory collection, doubt, and holding his own view as paramount.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This person is called a stream-enterer.

original: des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srab par byed de /🔽gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srab par byed de / gang zag 'di ni /
translated: Having attained the path of cultivation, he will weaken the attachment of desire and the malice of ill will.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //
translated: This person is a once-returner.

original: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de /🔽gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de / gang zag 'di ni /
translated: Having cultivated that path even more, he attains the abandonment of the desire realm’s desire and malice.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: This person is a non-returner.

original: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste /🔽gang zag 'di ni /
analyzed: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste / gang zag 'di ni /

original: smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste /

analyzed: gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni / rnam par @249a *//

analyzed: de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar skye bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te / gang zag 'di ni /
translated: Through the seeing of the wisdom of liberation, the three fetters of the view of the transitory collection, doubt, and holding a discipline and ritual to be paramount are completely abandoned.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This person is called a stream-enterer.

analyzed: des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srab par byed de / gang zag 'di ni /

analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'o //

analyzed: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de / gang zag 'di ni /

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: This person is called a non-returner.

analyzed: de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste /
translated: Through cultivating that path even more, he abandons attachment to the form realm, attachment to the formless realm, ignorance, pride, and excitation.

analyzed: dgra bcom pa'o //

analyzed: zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci'ang rung ste / kun 'byung ba'i chos can @249b de thams cad ni /

analyzed: 'gog pa'i chos can no //
translated: is all subject to cessation.

analyzed: zhes bya bar shes pas /

original: dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te /
translated: They attain the five faculties of faith and so forth.

original: 'di ni / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: 'di ni / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: this is the purity of the bodhisattva great beings’ eye of Dharma.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
translated: furthermore, the bodhisattva great beings’ eye of Dharma knows that this bodhisattva great being

original: sems dang po bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed pa ste /
translated: has given rise to the first level of the mind of awakening.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: He practices the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: He practices the perfection of moral discipline.🔽He practices the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: He practices the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: He practices the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: He practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te /
analyzed: de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te /
translated: Through that cause, he is endowed with the faculty of faith and the faculty of perseverance.

original: thabs mkhas pas ched du bsam ste lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed do //
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas ched du bsam ste lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed do //
translated: With skillful means, he intentionally takes on a body.

original: dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
translated: Because of his firm roots of virtue, this bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
analyzed: rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
translated: is born into a great and eminent family of kṣatriyas,

original: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
analyzed: bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
translated: is born into a great and eminent family of brahmins,

original: khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o //
translated: is born into a great and eminent family of householders,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: is born among the Cāturmahārājika gods,

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: He will be reborn among the gods of the Thirty-Three.

original: mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o //🔽'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o // dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o // 'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: He will be reborn among the Yāma gods.🔽He will be reborn among the Tuṣita gods.🔽He will be reborn among the Nirmāṇarati gods.

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o //
translated: He will be reborn among the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin gods.

original: de de dag na gnas shing sems @250a *//
analyzed: de de dag na gnas shing sems @250a *//
translated: While dwelling there,

original: can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: he will bring beings to maturity.

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will serve them with all the necessities of happiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: He will purify a buddhafield.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will serve the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas.

original: rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //🔽nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro // nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: He will serve them, honor them, make offerings to them, praise them, and revere them.🔽He will not fall to the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo //
translated: or to the pratyekabuddha level.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not turn back until he has attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar rab tu shes te /
translated: In this way, they know.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: this is the purity of the bodhisattva great beings’ eye of Dharma.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,
